description: FI_001: Tests form factor with certification and temperature filters
prompt: I need a DIN RAIL board with EN 50155 certification for -40°C to 85°C operation

description: FI_002: Tests extraction of processor-specific details and networking requirements
prompt: Find boards with quad-core ARM processors and dual GbE

description: FI_003: Tests form factor with processor and memory filters
prompt: Show me COM Express modules with 11th Gen Intel Core, ECC memory support

description: FI_004: Tests operating system compatibility and wireless connectivity feature extraction
prompt: Looking for an SBC that runs Ubuntu and has WiFi 5

description: FI_005: Tests extraction of manufacturer and specific I/O interface requirements
prompt: Find all Advantech products with USB 3.0 support

description: FI_006: Tests temperature range and storage interface requirements
prompt: Need boards with NVMe storage that operate at -40°C

description: FI_007: Tests memory capacity and wireless connectivity combinations
prompt: Show modules with at least 32GB RAM and Bluetooth 5 support

description: FI_008: Tests input voltage and form factor requirements
prompt: Find DIN rail mounted devices that accept 24V power input

description: FI_009: Tests processor manufacturer and architecture combinations
prompt: List all NXP ARM-based processors with eMMC storage

description: FI_010: Tests operating system and temperature requirements for specific applications
prompt: Need Windows IoT compatible boards operating from -40°C to 85°C

description: FI_011: Tests TDP and form factor combinations
prompt: Find Mini-ITX boards with processors under 15W TDP

description: FI_012: Tests certification and storage requirements extraction
prompt: Find MIL-STD-810 certified boards with SATA storage

description: FI_013: Tests storage and memory type combinations
prompt: Need boards with eMMC storage and LPDDR4 memory

description: FI_014: Tests multiple I/O interface requirements
prompt: Find boards with SATA 3.0 and PCIe Gen 4 support

description: FI_015: Tests processor core count and memory requirements
prompt: Show processors with 8 or more cores and 64GB memory support

description: FI_016: Tests wireless capability combinations
prompt: Find modules supporting both WiFi 5 and 5G connectivity

description: FI_017: Tests operating system and processor architecture combinations
prompt: List x86 boards compatible with both Windows and Linux

description: FI_018: Tests I/O and wireless requirements for specific use cases
prompt: Needs Windows IoT boards with dual Ethernet and LTE support

description: FI_019: Tests complex temperature and certification requirements
prompt: Find boards with UL and CE certification operating up to 70°C

description: FI_020: Tests multiple manufacturer-specific requirements
prompt: Show me Advantech or Kontron boards with Intel Atom processors
